amendment.description: Amendment transfers $5 million dollars from the Coast Guard's Operations Expenses to its Research, Development, Test and Evaluation Account, for the purpose of supporting Coast Guard Icebreaker sea trials.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 77 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to transfer $5 million dollars from the Coast Guard's Operations Expenses to its Research, Development, Test and Evaluation Account, for the purpose of supporting Coast Guard Icebreaker sea trials.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hunter amendment (A041) Agreed to by recorded vote: 245 - 168 (Roll no. 463).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hunter amendment (A041) Agreed to by recorded vote: 245 - 168 (Roll no. 463).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A041) offered by Mr. Hunter.
